extensionDescription.message: Remove the '>' prefix from quote when you make a reply. To set options, click the [...] button in the upper right corner.

replytextLabel.message: Remove the '>' prefix from quote in text mail.

replyhtmlLabel.message: Remove the '|' prefix from quote in html mail.

caretPositionLabel.message: Cursor position after reply formatting (reply position when quoting):

caretDisableLabel.message: Disable caret positioning (try this if it conflicts with other add-ons)

imeWorkaroundTip.description: Tip is not shown in Options by default; kept here for troubleshooting. On Thunderbird 143+, if IME won’t type, click Subject once and then click back in the body to type with IME (known workaround).

msgSaved.message: The option settings were saved at

msgCancelled.message: The option settings were restored at
